title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why it's ridiculous Joe Burrow didn't receive a single vote for MVP this season when he's the best example of "valuable" in the NFL. He believes there is one team that is clearly the best fit for Aaron Rodgers if he decides to leave the Packers. He also reveals his official pick for Super Bowl 56. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to preview the match ups for Sunday's big game. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
